mindspace.core: Influence depends on who delivers info
mindspace.power: Trusted/similar messengers >> authority; peers/experts amplify effect

mindspace.core: Loss aversion > gain seeking; frame as losses
mindspace.power: Small loss-framed incentives beat large gain-framed; deposits, lotteries work

mindspace.core: We conform to what (most) others do
mindspace.power: Descriptive norms strongest lever; show positive majority behaviour
Opt-out >> opt-in; inertia is huge driver

mindspace.core: Attention drawn to novel, simple, personal
mindspace.power: Make desired action stand out; novelty grabs 10-15s window

mindspace.core: Emotion drives action more than logic
mindspace.power: Hot states override cool reasoning; evoke emotion → change
Consistency + reciprocity; small → large requests escalate

mindspace.core: We act to feel better about ourselves
mindspace.power: Identity & self-image are top motivators; status/rewards amplify

meta_principles.permission_needed: Acceptability depends on: Who targeted / What behaviour / How achieved
meta_principles.personal_responsibility: Nudges can increase real responsibility, not erode it

core_message: Human behaviour is largely automatic & context-driven; policy that works with cognitive biases beats policy that fights them
